message.content:
Implement the following plan:

# Plan: Move template/guide files from docs/ to spec-design/

## Context

The files in `docs/` (`common-template.md`, `writing-guide.md`) are user-authored design specifications — rules and templates that AI agents reference when generating documents. `docs/` should be reserved for AI-generated output. These specification files need a new home: `spec-design/`.

## Changes

### 1. Create `spec-design/` directory and move files

- `docs/common-template.md` → `spec-design/common-template.md`
- `docs/writing-guide.md` → `spec-design/writing-guide.md`

Use `git mv` to preserve history.

### 2. Update `CLAUDE.md` references

- Change `docs/common-template.md` references to `spec-design/common-template.md`
- Update the Documentation Guidelines section to reflect the new structure:
  - `spec-design/` — user-authored design specs (templates, writing guides)
  - `docs/` — AI-generated documents (must follow spec-design rules)

### 3. Update internal cross-references

- `writing-guide.md` links to `common-template.md` — verify relative link still works (both files move together, so it should)

## Files to modify

- `spec-design/common-template.md` (moved from docs/)
- `spec-design/writing-guide.md` (moved from docs/)
- `CLAUDE.md` — update references and directory descriptions

## Verification

- `git status` confirms clean move (renamed, not deleted+added)
- All cross-references in CLAUDE.md point to correct paths
- Internal link in `writing-guide.md` still resolves


If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/ujuc/.REDACTED.jsonl

planContent:
# Plan: Move template/guide files from docs/ to spec-design/

## Context

The files in `docs/` (`common-template.md`, `writing-guide.md`) are user-authored design specifications — rules and templates that AI agents reference when generating documents. `docs/` should be reserved for AI-generated output. These specification files need a new home: `spec-design/`.

## Changes

### 1. Create `spec-design/` directory and move files

- `docs/common-template.md` → `spec-design/common-template.md`
- `docs/writing-guide.md` → `spec-design/writing-guide.md`

Use `git mv` to preserve history.

### 2. Update `CLAUDE.md` references

- Change `docs/common-template.md` references to `spec-design/common-template.md`
- Update the Documentation Guidelines section to reflect the new structure:
  - `spec-design/` — user-authored design specs (templates, writing guides)
  - `docs/` — AI-generated documents (must follow spec-design rules)

### 3. Update internal cross-references

- `writing-guide.md` links to `common-template.md` — verify relative link still works (both files move together, so it should)

## Files to modify

- `spec-design/common-template.md` (moved from docs/)
- `spec-design/writing-guide.md` (moved from docs/)
- `CLAUDE.md` — update references and directory descriptions

## Verification

- `git status` confirms clean move (renamed, not deleted+added)
- All cross-references in CLAUDE.md point to correct paths
- Internal link in `writing-guide.md` still resolves

content.thinking: Let me implement the plan step by step. First, let me read the files that need to be modified.

file.content:
# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to AI agents when working with code in this repository.

## Project Overview

Utilities and configurations for AI agents.

**Status**: Early skeleton — no source code, build system, or dependencies yet.

## Documentation Guidelines

When creating or editing documents in this repository, all Markdown files under `docs/` **must** include YAML front matter as defined in [`docs/common-template.md`](./docs/common-template.md).

### Required YAML Front Matter

Every document must begin with the following front matter block:

```yaml
---
name: [document title]
description: [one-line summary, max 200 chars]
version: [CalVer: YYYY.MM.Patch]
tags: [comma-separated tags]
context: |
  [background information for agent interpretation]
metadata:
---
```

All fields are **required**. Refer to `docs/common-template.md` for detailed field definitions and formatting rules.

## Maintenance Rules

### CLAUDE.md Size Limit

This file must stay under **300 lines**. When editing this file, if the total line count exceeds 300, notify the user that the file needs to be split into smaller documents (e.g., moving sections into `docs/`).

file.content:
# 가이드 문서를 위한 가이드

가이드 문서를 작성하기 위한 문서이다.

## 포멧

### YAML frontmatter

[common-template.md](common-template.md)을 이용해서 기본 내용을 작성한다.

`metadata` 필드에 `role`, `priority`, `applies-to`, `optimized-for` 필드를 추가한다.

- `role`: 문서의 role을 정의한다.
- `priority`: 문서의 우선순위를 정의한다. `high | medium | low`
- `applies-to`: 문서가 적용되는 대상을 정의한다. `agent | user | both`
- `optimized-for`: 문서를 최적화한 agent 모델을 정의한다. e.g., Claude, GPT, Gemini ... 의 모델명을 이용한다.

### 문서 내용

한글을 이용한다고 명시된 부분을 제외한 모든 부분은 영어로 작성한다.

```markdown
# [Guide title]

## Responsibilities

- **Actions 1**: Description of action 1
- **Actions 2**: Description of action 2
- **Actions 3**: Description of action 3

## Section 1

[Body content]

## Section 2

[Body content]

## See Also

[Related guide 1](related-guide-1.md) - description
[Related guide 2](related-guide-2.md) - description
[Related guide 3](https://example.com) - description
```

content.thinking:
Now let me proceed with the implementation:

1. Create `spec-design/` directory and move files using `git mv`
2. Update `CLAUDE.md` references
3. Verify cross-references in `writing-guide.md` (already checked - it links to `common-template.md` with a relative path, so it'll still work after the move)

Let me do step 1 first.

content.text:
`writing-guide.md`의 내부 링크는 상대 경로(`common-template.md`)이므로 두 파일이 함께 이동하면 그대로 유효합니다. 진행합니다.

### 1단계: `spec-design/` 디렉토리 생성 및 파일 이동

input.command: mkdir -p /Users/ujuc/repos/agent-stuff/spec-design && git -C /Users/ujuc/repos/agent-stuff mv docs/common-template.md spec-design/common-template.md && git -C /Users/ujuc/repos/agent-stuff mv docs/writing-guide.md spec-design/writing-guide.md
input.description: Create spec-design/ and git mv both files

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to AI agents when working with code in this repository.

## Project Overview

Utilities and configurations for AI agents.

**Status**: Early skeleton — no source code, build system, or dependencies yet.

## Documentation Guidelines

When creating or editing documents in this repository, all Markdown files under `docs/` **must** include YAML front matter as defined in [`docs/common-template.md`](./docs/common-template.md).

### Required YAML Front Matter

Every document must begin with the following front matter block:

```yaml
---
name: [document title]
description: [one-line summary, max 200 chars]
version: [CalVer: YYYY.MM.Patch]
tags: [comma-separated tags]
context: |
  [background information for agent interpretation]
metadata:
---
```

All fields are **required**. Refer to `docs/common-template.md` for detailed field definitions and formatting rules.

## Maintenance Rules

### CLAUDE.md Size Limit

This file must stay under **300 lines**. When editing this file, if the total line count exceeds 300, notify the user that the file needs to be split into smaller documents (e.g., moving sections into `docs/`).

file.content:
# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to AI agents when working with code in this repository.

## Project Overview

Utilities and configurations for AI agents.

**Status**: Early skeleton — no source code, build system, or dependencies yet.

## Directory Structure

- `spec-design/` — User-authored design specs (templates, writing guides). These define the rules that AI-generated documents must follow.
- `docs/` — AI-generated documents. All Markdown files here **must** follow the specs in `spec-design/`.

## Documentation Guidelines

When creating or editing documents in this repository, all Markdown files under `docs/` **must** include YAML front matter as defined in [`spec-design/common-template.md`](./spec-design/common-template.md).

### Required YAML Front Matter

Every document must begin with the following front matter block:

```yaml
---
name: [document title]
description: [one-line summary, max 200 chars]
version: [CalVer: YYYY.MM.Patch]
tags: [comma-separated tags]
context: |
  [background information for agent interpretation]
metadata:
---
```

All fields are **required**. Refer to `spec-design/common-template.md` for detailed field definitions and formatting rules.

## Maintenance Rules

### CLAUDE.md Size Limit

This file must stay under **300 lines**. When editing this file, if the total line count exceeds 300, notify the user that the file needs to be split into smaller documents (e.g., moving sections into `docs/`).

content.text:
모든 변경이 완료되었습니다. 요약:

- **`docs/common-template.md`** → `spec-design/common-template.md` (`git mv`로 이동, 히스토리 보존)
- **`docs/writing-guide.md`** → `spec-design/writing-guide.md` (untracked 파일이라 일반 이동)
- **`CLAUDE.md`** — `Directory Structure` 섹션 추가, 모든 `docs/common-template.md` 참조를 `spec-design/common-template.md`로 변경
- **`writing-guide.md`** 내부 링크 — `common-template.md` 상대 경로로 두 파일이 같은 디렉토리에 있으므로 수정 불필요
